subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa won the Navistar L.P.G.A. Classic for her seventh victory of the year and first since May, beating Kandie Kung with a par on the second hole of a playoff in Prattville, Ala. Recharged after a month away from the tour, Ochoa closed with a two-under 70 to match Kung (67) and Cristie Kerr (66) at 15-under 273. Kerr was eliminated with a bogey on the first extra hole.
